person.persName: Benjamin T. Hale (Hickman County, Kentucky, trader and master brick mason)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, trader and master brick mason. Virginia native. Married to Nancy McCrary Hale. Father of Joseph Thomas Hale, Frances Hale, Benjamin S. Hale, Bartholomew Hale, Netty Hale, Sidney Alice Hale, George R. Hale, and Nancy Hale. Married to Sophronia H. Gentre Hale in December 1858, in Hickman County, Kentucky. Father of John E. Hale, E. Vandam Hale, and Henry S.B. Hale. Trader in Humphreys County, Tennessee, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Humphreys County in 1850. Master brick mason in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860.
